about_the_game:
World War II is engulfing the globe, with the Pacific Ocean ablaze in conflict. You’ve just been enlisted in the navy, joining the crew of an American destroyer. As a crucial member of this team, you will participate in key operations against Imperial Japan.

Your destroyer is armed with iconic naval weapons from World War II, such as the Bofors, Oerlikon, 5-inch deck guns, torpedoes, and depth charges. Each weapon is portrayed with realistic detail. Master the art of maintaining, operating, and firing these classic armaments.

The vast expanse of the Pacific Ocean awaits. Navigating these waters requires precision and skill. Utilize maps, compasses, rangefinders, chronometers, and even the stars to chart your course through perilous seas.

The fog of war shrouds the oceans, making it essential to detect enemies while concealing your own position. Harness the electromagnetic spectrum to locate adversaries, use radars, eavesdrop enemie’s radio communication and crack their codes when deploying smoke screens and encrypt your own signals to remain undetected.


War isn’t just about combat; maintaining the ship and crew is vital. Someone must clean the deck, prepare meals, oil the guns, load supplies, paint the hull, and scrub the barnacles. Fulfilling these responsibilities will earn the respect of your superiors.

As part of the U.S. Navy, you’ll play a role in the greatest naval conflict in history. Safeguard supply convoys, support island assaults, defend the skies from Japanese planes, and take down legendary warships of the Imperial forces.

Key Features

  • Serve aboard a World War II American destroyer in the Pacific theater.

  • Operate iconic naval weapons like Bofors, Oerlikons, and torpedoes.

  • Navigate treacherous waters using maps, compasses, and the stars.

  • Eavesdrop on enemy communications and crack Japanese codes.

  • Perform essential daily tasks to maintain the ship and crew.

  • Engage in historical missions, from convoy defense to island assaults.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5-7500 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated Graphic Cards are not supported. Intel ARC series may not supported yet.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5-10600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 SUPER
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated Graphic Cards are not supported. Intel ARC series may not supported yet.
